text: Gareth Southgate (born 3 September 1970) is an English professional football manager and former player. He is currently managing the England men's national football team. As a player, he played as a defender. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League FA Cup League Cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals
